sentences.en: A general election became a certainty three weeks ago.
sentences.cn: 3个星期前举行普选已确定无疑。

sentences.en: Given the sheer number of stars that exist it's a mathematical certainty that there is life on other planets.
sentences.cn: 考虑到现有星球数量，从数学的角度来说，其他行星上面肯定存在生命。

sentences.en: He must know to a certainty before he could rest that night.
sentences.cn: 他必须确切弄明白了,当晚才睡得着.

sentences.en: He spoke with clearness and certainty.
sentences.cn: 他说的明白确切.

sentences.en: He usually does quite well, but it’s not a certainty.
sentences.cn: 通常他都做得相当好，但也并不一定。

sentences.en: Her return to the team now seems a certainty.
sentences.cn: 她的归队现在似乎已成定局。

sentences.en: I began to realize the certainty of freezing to death if I remained where I was.
sentences.cn: 我开始认识到，如果我呆在原地不动，必定冻死无疑。

sentences.en: I can't say with any certainty where I shall be next week.
sentences.cn: 我不能确切地说下周我在什么地方.

sentences.en: I can't say with any certainty where I'll be next week.
sentences.cn: 我根本不知道我下周会在什么地方。

sentences.en: I know for a certainty that the company has been bought up.
sentences.cn: 我确实知道公司已经被人收购了.

sentences.en: It's a certainty that our team will win the game this time.
sentences.cn: 这次我们队肯定会赢得这场比赛.

sentences.en: It's a dead certainty that this horse will win the race.
sentences.cn: 这匹马在比赛中获胜是必定的.

sentences.en: Petitioners suggest that anything less than certainty, that any speculation, is irresponsible.
sentences.cn: 申诉者认为不准确的事或推断都是不负责任的.

sentences.en: Such attitudes are valueless unless they reflect inner cognition and certainty.
sentences.cn: 这种态度如果不能反映内心的认知和把握就毫无价值。

sentences.en: the certainty of being caught
sentences.cn: 被抓的必然

sentences.en: The only certainty is that there will need to be major changes.
sentences.cn: 唯一能够确定的事就是需要重大的变革。

sentences.en: The result is impossible to predict with any degree of certainty .
sentences.cn: 这一结果完全无法确切预测。

sentences.en: There is too little certainty about the present state of the German economy.
sentences.cn: 德国当前的经济非常不稳定。

sentences.en: This is a virtual certainty.
sentences.cn: 这是一件已肯定的事.

sentences.en: We have a moral certainty that the experiment will prove a success.
sentences.cn: 我们内心确信实验将获得成功.
